text: We’re working on it. We’ll start taking overseas payments maximum in a week time.

elements.text: We’re working on it. We’ll start taking overseas payments maximum in a week time.

text: <!here> It looks like most people can do 9am EST, and this allows people in Addis/Europe to join as well. Let's aim to do 9am Monday, Wednesday, Friday for our standup calls. If this is a problem for many people, let me know. Perhaps we can do Monday and Friday 9am, Wednesday 9pm. For now, I'm going to keep them all at 9am M,W,F.

elements.text: It looks like most people can do 9am EST, and this allows people in Addis/Europe to join as well. Let's aim to do 9am Monday, Wednesday, Friday for our standup calls. If this is a problem for many people, let me know. Perhaps we can do Monday and Friday 9am, Wednesday 9pm. For now, I'm going to keep them all at 9am M,W,F.

text: set up a reminder “Delivery workstream stand up is starting. Join here: https://mit.zoom.us/j/830540249” in this channel at 9AM every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, Eastern Daylight Time.
